tag_list: international-energy, oil--gas, liquefied-natural-gas, lng, major-capital-projects, construction, international-contracts, disputes, claims-resolution, africa, angola, japan, china, asia
overview:
Lawyer / Attorney / Legal Counsel to Angola LNG Limited in Houston and Angola, Africa. Head of legal management for $5.7B 5 mtpa LNG plant, as well as housing development and power plant in Soyo, Angola, Africa. This international project involves hundreds of contractors from various countries including the U.S., China, Japan, Africa, etc.

International Energy, Oil & Gas, Liquefied Natural Gas (LNG). Major Capital Projects, Construction, International Contracts, Claims Resolution. Africa (especially Angola), Japan, China and the rest of Asia.
